synopsis.text:
Set in a lush forest teeming with friendly wildlife, a young boy named Sasuke embarks on a courageous journey to confront an evil sorceress who has disrupted the harmony of his idyllic home. When one of his beloved animal companions falls prey to the sorceress's malevolent powers, Sasuke resolves to acquire the skills necessary to vanquish her. Leaving the comfort of his home and the company of his sister, he seeks out a wise hermit hidden deep within the woods.

Under the hermit's tutelage, Sasuke devotes three years to mastering the art of magic. As he hones his newfound abilities, the animals of the forest rally behind him, sensing the pure intentions that drive his quest. With their unwavering support, Sasuke prepares to face the sorceress in a climactic battle between good and evil, determined to restore peace to his once-tranquil home.

As the first Japanese animation to be released theatrically in North America, 'Magic Boy' follows Sasuke's transformative journey from a young boy into a powerful magic wielder, showcasing the timeless themes of bravery, friendship, and the ultimate triumph of good over evil.
